card.name: Abrupt Decay
card.text: Abrupt Decay can't be countered by spells or abilities. Destroy target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 3 or less.

card.text: Annihilating Fire deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a filibuster counter on Azor's Elocutors. Then if Azor's Elocutors has five or more filibuster counters on it, you win the game. Whenever a source deals damage to you, remove a filibuster counter from Azor's Elocutors.

card.text: First strike Unleash

card.name: Stab Wound
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Stealer of Secrets
card.text: Whenever Stealer of Secrets deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Steam Vents
card.text: As Steam Vents enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Steam Vents enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Stonefare Crocodile
card.text: {2}{B}: Stonefare Crocodile gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Street Spasm
card.text: Street Spasm deals X damage to target creature without flying you don't control. Overload {X}{X}{R}{R}

card.name: Street Sweeper
card.text: Whenever Street Sweeper attacks, destroy all Auras attached to target land.

card.name: Sundering Growth
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment, then populate.

card.name: Supreme Verdict
card.text: Supreme Verdict can't be countered. Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Survey the Wreckage
card.text: Destroy target land. Put a 1/1 red Goblin creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Swift Justice
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike and lifelink.

card.name: Syncopate
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Tablet of the Guilds
card.text: As Tablet of the Guilds enters the battlefield, choose two colors. Whenever you cast a spell, if it's at least one of the chosen colors, you gain 1 life for each of the chosen colors it is.

card.name: Tavern Swindler
card.text: {T}, Pay 3 life: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 6 life.

card.name: Teleportal
card.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. Overload {3}{U}{R}

card.name: Temple Garden
card.text: As Temple Garden enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Temple Garden enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Terrus Wurm
card.text: Scavenge {6}{B}

card.name: Thoughtflare
card.text: Draw four cards, then discard two cards.

card.name: Tower Drake
card.text: Flying {W}: Tower Drake gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Traitorous Instinct
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.

card.name: Transguild Promenade
card.text: Transguild Promenade enters the battlefield tapped. When Transguild Promenade enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Treasured Find
card.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Treasured Find.

card.name: Trestle Troll
card.text: Defender Reach {1}{B}{G}: Regenerate Trestle Troll.

card.name: Trostani, Selesnya's Voice
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness. {1}{G}{W}, {T}: Populate.

card.name: Trostani's Judgment
card.text: Exile target creature, then populate.

card.name: Ultimate Price
card.text: Destroy target monocolored creature.

card.name: Underworld Connections
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card."

card.name: Urban Burgeoning
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "Untap this land during each other player's untap step."

card.name: Utvara Hellkite
card.text: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, put a 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Vandalblast
card.text: Destroy target artifact you don't control. Overload {4}{R}

card.name: Viashino Racketeer
card.text: When Viashino Racketeer enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Vitu-Ghazi Guildmage
card.text: {4}{G}{W}: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield. {2}{G}{W}: Populate.

card.name: Voidwielder
card.text: When Voidwielder enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Volatile Rig
card.text: Trample Volatile Rig attacks each turn if able. Whenever Volatile Rig is dealt damage, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Volatile Rig. When Volatile Rig dies, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, it deals 4 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Vraska the Unseen
card.text: +1: Until your next turn, whenever a creature deals combat damage to Vraska the Unseen, destroy that creature. -3: Destroy target nonland permanent. -7: Put three 1/1 black Assassin creature tokens onto the battlefield with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game."

card.name: Wayfaring Temple
card.text: Wayfaring Temple's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. Whenever Wayfaring Temple deals combat damage to a player, populate.

card.name: Wild Beastmaster
card.text: Whenever Wild Beastmaster attacks, each other creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Wild Beastmaster's power.

card.name: Worldspine Wurm
card.text: Trample When Worldspine Wurm dies, put three 5/5 green Wurm creature tokens with trample onto the battlefield. When Worldspine Wurm is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Zanikev Locust
card.text: Flying Scavenge {2}{B}{B}
